false FC4 Open World: Weapon unlocker
Unlocks All weapons from the start.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] All weapons are available in the shop from the start. [*] The weapons are not available for free in the shops; the player will still need to purchase these weapons from the shop to use them. [*] The player can still get free weapons by liberating radio towers and/or picking them up off fallen ememies. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] This mod is part of jvarnes' Open World Mod. [*] This mod is co-op friendly. [/list]
